meanings.definition: A person engaged in commercial or industrial enterprise.
meanings.sent1: Many businesspersons work hard to grow their companies.
meanings.sent2: The conference room was filled with businesspersons discussing the new project.
meanings.sent3: The businesspersons at the networking event were like busy bees buzzing around.
meanings.sent4: In the world of entrepreneurship, businesspersons are the architects of their own success.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was dotted with the offices of busy businesspersons.

meanings.sent1: Several businesspersons attended the seminar on marketing strategies.
meanings.sent2: The businesspersons gathered for a group photo after the successful merger.
meanings.sent3: The businesspersons in the boardroom looked like a flock of well-dressed birds.
meanings.sent4: The marketplace was bustling with businesspersons trading goods and services.
meanings.sent5: The event was a great opportunity for businesspersons to network and share ideas.
